availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J Sheets (Franklin County, Kentucky farmer)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Eliza Jane Alexander Sheets on November 15, 1855. Father of Emerelta Sheets and Roe Ann Sheets. Employed as a farmer in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Marriages, Film #994034, p.4
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 340
